name: paper-button
title: Paper button

raised.name: raised
raised.description: If true, the button will be styled with a shadow.
raised.title: Raised

recenteringTouch.name: recenteringTouch
recenteringTouch.description:
By default the ripple emanates from where the user touched the button.
Set this to true to always center the ripple.
recenteringTouch.title: Recentering touch

fill.name: fill
fill.description:
By default the ripple expands to fill the button. Set this to true to
constrain the ripple to a circle within the button.
fill.title: Fill
